actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the issuance in the year 1982 of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the Bicentennial Anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the United States and the government of the Netherlands.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue in the year 1982 a special postage stamp in honor of the two hundredth anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic and commercial relations between the United States and the Netherlands. Provides that such stamp shall be designed, if feasible, in cooperation with the government of the Netherlands.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the issuance in the year 1982 of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of the Bicentennial Anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the United States and the government of the Netherlands.
